p_blocto_recommendation: We recommend you adopt Blocto as your first Flow wallet. Check <0>Blocto Supports</0> to learn more.
p_cannot_change_wallet_reminder: Please note that you cannot change the blockchain wallet address after connection because it is your on-chain identification to store your digital creations and cryptocurrency income. To learn more about the blockchain wallet, please check <0>FAQ</0> or <1>Discord</1>.
